content:
Here is the contact information for Ross Lake Resort:

**Phone Number:**
(206) 386-4437 or (877) 443-5453 (toll-free)

**Email Address:**
[info@rosslakeresort.com](mailto:info@rosslakeresort.com)

**Website:**
[www.rosslakeresort.com](http://www.rosslakeresort.com)

**Mailing Address:**
Ross Lake Resort
51480 Highway 20
Rockport, WA 98283

**Reservations:**
You can make reservations online through their website or by calling their phone number. They recommend making reservations well in advance, especially during peak season (June to September).

**Office Hours:**
The resort's office is open from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM (Pacific Time) from May to October. During the off-season, the office is open from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (Pacific Time).

**Note:**
Keep in mind that Ross Lake Resort is located in a remote area, and cell phone service may be limited. If you're having trouble reaching them by phone, you can try emailing them or using their online contact form on their website.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll have a fantastic time at Ross Lake Resort with your friends!
